data.name: AndroidServiceDescriptionLeftConnected
data.value: The left hearing system is connected.

data.name: AndroidServiceDescriptionNoneConnected
data.value: No hearing systems are connected yet.

data.name: automationHelpPageDescription
data.value: The Autostart feature allows you to automatically start your hearing program with one of the following two options:

data.name: automationHelpPageGeoDescription
data.value: You can start your hearing program near a certain place such as a restaurant.

data.name: automationHelpPageWifiDescription
data.value: Your hearing program starts automatically as soon as your cell phone is connected to a Wi-Fi network.

data.name: bluetoothStartPageInfoText
data.value: Please turn on your hearing system. Make sure it's located near your smartphone.

data.name: change_hearing_aid_Desc
data.value: Change a hearing system that is currently connected.

data.name: describe_hearing_aid_problem_desc
data.value: Briefly describe the hearing problem so we can help you better.

data.name: dialog_ActivateDemo_Desc
data.value: Would you like to activate demo mode?

data.name: dialog_CloseDemo_Desc
data.value: Do you want to close demo mode now?

data.name: dialog_disconnect_hearingaids_desc
data.value: Do you really want to disconnect these hearing systems?

data.name: dialog_GeoLoc_InUse_User_Denied_Desc
data.value: You have denied the permission to use the location while using the app. If you want to use this feature, set the appropriate permission in the settings.

data.name: dialog_GeoLoc_InUse_User_Denied_Find_Desc
data.value: You have denied the permission to use the location while using the hormann app. This permission is needed for the 'Find hearing systems' feature. If you want to use this feature, set the appropriate permission in the settings.

data.name: dialog_GeoLoc_InUse_User_Denied_Start_Desc
data.value: You have denied the permission to use the location while using the hormann app. This permission is needed for the 'automatic hearing program start' feature. If you want to use this feature, set the appropriate permission in the settings.

data.name: dialog_GeoLoc_User_Denied_Desc
data.value: You have denied the permission to use the location always. If you want to use this feature, set the appropriate permission in the settings.

data.name: dialog_InternetConnectionRequired
data.value: An active Internet connection is required to use this service.

data.name: dialog_LoadUserProfileFailed
data.value: Unable to load profile. Failed to connect to Internet.

data.name: dialog_promoteUserToUseThisFunctionalityDescription
data.value: Please connect the user to your account to use this function.

data.name: dialog_remove_hearingaid_desc
data.value: Do you really want to remove the hearing aid?

data.name: dialog_scanDevicesAgainDesc
data.value: Do you want to scan for more available devices?

data.name: dlg_autoProgramStart_backgroundLocation_hint
data.value: To use the "automatic hearing program start” feature, the hormann app collects location data even when the app is running in the background.

data.name: dlg_autoProgramStart_backgroundLocation_permissionDialog
data.value: Open the location settings to allow the hormann app to use the location all the time. This is needed to use the "automatic hearing program start" feature.

data.name: dlg_autoProgramStart_backgroundLocation_preCheck
data.value: The hormann app collects location data to enable the automatic hearing program start even when the app is only running in the background. You have denied the ‘always allow' permission for the use of the location services. If you want to use the automatic hearing program start feature, set the appropriate permission in the settings.

data.name: dlg_autoProgramStart_fineBackgroundLocation_preCheck
data.value: Open the location settings to allow the hormann app to use the precise location all the time. This is needed to use the "automatic hearing program start" feature.

data.name: dlg_connect_bluetoothConnect_preCheck
data.value: You have denied the permission to access 'Nearby devices'. The permission is needed by the hormann app to connect to your hearing systems. Please set the appropriate permission in the app settings menu.

data.name: dlg_disabled_location_service_all_functions_description
data.value: In order to use the functions find hearing aids or position based automatic hearing program start confirm the next dialog.

data.name: dlg_disabled_location_service_auto_program_description
data.value: In order to use the position based automatic hearing program start you must activate the location services. Please confirm the next dialog with OK.

data.name: dlg_disabled_location_service_ble_scan_description
data.value: In order to search for hearing aids you must activate the location services. Please confirm the next dialog with OK.

data.name: dlg_discovery_bluetoothScanConnect_hint
data.value: To search for hearing aids you must allow the permission to access 'Nearby devices' to the hormann app. Please do this in the next step.

data.name: dlg_discovery_bluetoothScanConnect_preCheck
data.value: You have denied the permission to access 'Nearby devices'. This permission is needed by the hormann app to search for your hearing systems and to connect to them later on. Please set the appropriate permission in the app settings menu.

data.name: dlg_discovery_locationInUse_hint
data.value: To search for hearing aids you must grant 'While using' location permissions. Please do this in the next step to find and connect your hearing systems.

data.name: dlg_mapCurrentPosition_inUse_preCheck
data.value: You have denied the permission to use the location while using the hormann app. This permission is needed for the 'Current position on map' feature. If you want to use this feature, set the appropriate permission in the settings.

data.name: dlg_mapCurrentPosition_locationInUse_hint
data.value: To use the function 'Current position on map' the hormann app requires authorization for location determination. In the next step please give the hormann app the permission 'While using'.

data.name: dlg_no_internet_desc
data.value: Please connect your smartphone to the Internet and try this action again.

data.name: dlg_no_internet_warning_desc
data.value: Some functionalities are not available when the device is offline.

data.name: dlg_no_wifi_desc
data.value: Please connect your smartphone to a Wi-Fi network and then try this action again.

data.name: dlg_permission_bluetooth_hint
data.value: To search for or connect to your hearing aids you must allow the permission to access 'Nearby devices' to the hormann app. Please do this in the next step.

data.name: dlg_permission_bluetooth_preCheck
data.value: You have denied the permission to access 'Nearby devices'. This permission is needed by the hormann app to search for or connect to your hearing systems. Please set the appropriate permission in the app settings menu.

data.name: dlg_permission_location_hint
data.value: For some functions the app requires authorization for location determination. In the next step please give the app the permission 'Always allow'.

data.name: dlg_permission_location_in_use_find_hint
data.value: To use the function 'Find hearing systems' the hormann app requires authorization for location determination. In the next step please give the hormann app the permission 'While using'.

data.name: dlg_permission_location_in_use_hint
data.value: For some functions the hormann app requires authorization for location determination. In the next step please give the hormann app the permission 'While using'.

data.name: dlg_StartTrackingFailed_Desc
data.value: The hearing system position tracking could not be started. Please check the settings of the hormann app.

data.name: dlg_tracking_alwaysLocation_preCheck
data.value: The hormann app collects location data to enable the 'Find hearing systems' feature even when the app is only running in the background. You have denied the ‘always allow' permission for the use of the location services. If you want to use the 'Find hearing systems' feature, set the appropriate permission in the settings.

data.name: error_Connection_BothInstrumentErrorMessage
data.value: A connection to your hearing systems could not be established. Please check that they are turned on and try again!

data.name: error_Connection_BothInstrumentUnsupportedErrorMessage
data.value: A connection to your hearing systems could not be established because both of them are unsupported.

data.name: error_Connection_GeneralErrorMessage
data.value: A connection to your hearing systems could not be established. Please check that they are turned on and try again!

data.name: error_Connection_GeneralErrorTitle
data.value: Error in connecting your hearing systems

data.name: error_Connection_LeftInstrumentErrorMessage
data.value: No connection could be established to the left hearing system. Please check that the device is on and try again! You can also use the app with just one hearing system.

data.name: error_Connection_LeftInstrumentErrorTitle
data.value: No connection to the left hearing system

data.name: error_Connection_LeftInstrumentOnlyErrorMessage
data.value: No connection could be established to the left hearing system. Please check that the device is on and try again!

data.name: error_Connection_LeftInstrumentUnsupportedErrorMessage
data.value: No connection could be established to the left hearing system because it is unsupported. You can still use the app with just one hearing system.

data.name: error_Connection_ResolutionBackToSelectionMessage
data.value: Did you inadvertently select the wrong hearing system? Go back and check the names of the hearing systems you selected.

data.name: error_Connection_ResolutionGotoFindHearingAidMessage
data.value: If you have lost your hearing systems, the app can help you find them again. Please tap here.

data.name: error_Connection_ResolutionPairMessage
data.value: Use the bluetooth settings menu to pair or pair again your hearing systems with the smartphone. Try connect again afterwards.

data.name: error_Connection_ResolutionRetryMessage
data.value: The app is attempting to reconnect. Please restart your devices by turning them off and on again.

data.name: error_Connection_ResolutionUseOneInstrumentOnlyMessage
data.value: The app connects to just one hearing system. If you want to connect to both hearing systems later on, go to 'My hearing systems' in the app settings menu and disconnect the single hearing system.

data.name: error_Connection_RightInstrumentErrorMessage
data.value: No connection could be established to the right hearing system. Please check that the device is on and try again. You can also use the app with just one hearing system.

data.name: error_Connection_RightInstrumentErrorTitle
data.value: No connection to the right hearing system

data.name: error_Connection_RightInstrumentOnlyErrorMessage
data.value: No connection could be established to the right hearing system. Please check that the device is on and try again.

data.name: error_Connection_RightInstrumentUnsupportedErrorMessage
data.value: No connection could be established to the right hearing system because it is unsupported. You can still use the app with just one hearing system.

data.name: error_Connection_UnsupportedHearingSystemErrorMessage
data.value: You tried to connect to a hearing system not supported by this app version.

data.name: error_Hardware_BluetoothMissingMessage
data.value: Your smartphone does not have Bluetooth. The app needs Bluetooth to communicate with your hearing systems. Unfortunately, your smartphone is not suitable for this.

data.name: error_Hardware_BluetoothNotActivatedMessage
data.value: Bluetooth is disabled on your smartphone. The app needs Bluetooth to communicate with your hearing systems.

data.name: error_Hardware_LocationServiceDisabledMessage
data.value: Location is disabled on your smartphone. The hormann app needs the location service to scan and find your hearing aids and for the automatic hearing program start.

data.name: error_Hardware_NoHearingAidConnectPermissionMessage
data.value: The hormann app does not have the permission to establish a connection to your hearing systems. Please go to your smartphone settings to give the app the permission to continue.

data.name: error_Hardware_NoHearingAidDiscoveryPermissionMessage
data.value: The app does not have permission to search for your hearing systems. Please go to your smartphone settings to give the app permission to continue.

data.name: error_Hardware_NoHearingAidDiscoveryPermissionTitle
data.value: No permission to scan for devices

data.name: error_Hardware_NoTrackingLocationPermissionMessage
data.value: The app does not have the permission to get the position of your hearing systems. This is needed for "find hearing systems" feature. Please go to the location settings of the app and provide the appropriate permission to continue.

data.name: error_Hardware_NoTrackingLocationPermissionTitle
data.value: No permission to find your hearing systems

data.name: error_Hardware_ResolutionAllowAccessNearbyDevicesMessage
data.value: Go to System Settings and allow the access of 'Nearby Devices'.

data.name: error_Hardware_ResolutionAllowLocationMessage
data.value: Go to System Settings and allow the usage of location data for this app.

data.name: error_Hardware_ResolutionGotoSettingsMessage
data.value: Go to your smartphone settings and activate Bluetooth manually.

data.name: error_Hardware_ResolutionLocationServiceEnableMessage
data.value: Open the location (services) settings in order to activate the location service.

data.name: error_Hardware_ResolutionRetryMessage
data.value: The operation will be performed again.

data.name: error_Hardware_ResolutionStartDemoMessage
data.value: The app launches in demo mode. This allows you to try out the features without any devices. You can stop demo mode at any time.

data.name: error_Hardware_ResolutionTitle
data.value: What do you want to do now?

data.name: error_Hardware_SDKErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error in initializing the app. Please try again or contact Support.

data.name: fav_EditNameDescription
data.value: Please give your hearing program a new name:

data.name: gblNotification_ActivateGeoTrackingMsg

data.name: gblNotification_ChangeLanguageDesc
data.value: Do you want to change the language?

data.name: gblNotification_ConnectionLostMessage
data.value: The connection to your {0} hearing system has been interrupted.

data.name: gblNotification_FindStoreConnectionErrorDesc
data.value: Unable to connect to the Store Service.

data.name: gblNotification_LowBatteryMessage
data.value: Your {0} hearing system battery is almost empty. Please replace it in the next few hours.

data.name: gblNotification_NoGeoTrackingMsg
data.value: You have disabled device tracking. To use this function, activate it under Settings.

data.name: gblNotification_NoGoogleMapsAvailableMessage
data.value: Unfortunately, the map service cannot be used on your smartphone. Please check to ensure that Google Play Services are up-to-date.

data.name: gblNotification_ProgramCollectionAdjusted
data.value: The hearing programs have been adjusted to your current hearing system settings.

data.name: gbl_ConnectionLost_Reconnecting
data.value: Your hearing systems have been disconnected. Please check your hearing systems. The app tries to reconnect.

data.name: geofenceservice_notification_desc
data.value: The Hormann app geofence service is active.

data.name: help_FindDevicePage_LastSignalTextPartOne
data.value: The last signal was received on

data.name: help_FindDevicePage_LocationTextPartOne
data.value: The map shows the location where your hearing system

data.name: help_FindDevicePage_LocationTextPartTwo
data.value: was last connected with the app.

data.name: help_FindDevicePage_MapNotLoaded
data.value: No map available to show the location.

data.name: help_FindDevicePage_NoDeviceKnown
data.value: No hearing system known for this side.

data.name: help_topic_1_1_content_text
data.value: To use your hearing systems with your iOS device (iPhone), you must first pair your hearing systems and iPhone before using the app. This way, the hearing aids and the iPhone communicate with each other. Please follow the instructions to successfully pair the hearing systems.

data.name: help_topic_1_1_list_item_1
data.value: Touch the Settings icon on your iPhone.

data.name: help_topic_1_1_list_item_2
data.value: In the Settings menu, go to: Hearing aids or General → Accessibility → MFi Hearing Aids, respectively

data.name: help_topic_1_1_list_item_3
data.value: If the Bluetooth function is still disabled in this screen, activate Bluetooth. While the iPhone searches for the hearing aids, open and close the battery compartment of your hearing aids (this puts the hearing aids in pairing mode).

data.name: help_topic_1_1_list_item_4
data.value: As soon as your iPhone detects your hearing systems for the first time your first name and “HA#123456" appears. If this does not happen within 5-7 seconds, go back on the upper left edge of the screen and call up "Hearing aids" again.

data.name: help_topic_1_1_list_item_5
data.value: Touch the name of the hearing system to connect the hearing systems to the iPhone.

data.name: help_topic_1_1_list_item_6
data.value: Two pairing requests appear - one for each hearing system. Select Pair to join. The requests may appear with a few seconds delay.

data.name: help_topic_1_1_sub_title
data.value: Connect your hearing systems to an iOS device

data.name: help_topic_1_2_content_text
data.value: To use your hearing systems with your Android device, you must first pair the hearing system and the Android device. Please follow the instructions:

data.name: help_topic_1_2_list_item_3
data.value: Change the settings to ON if Bluetooth is off. Open and close the battery compartment of the hearing systems. This puts the hearing systems in pairing mode.

data.name: help_topic_1_2_list_item_4
data.value: Under Paired Devices you will see your first name followed by "HA#123456" once the hearing systems have been detected. If the name does not appear in the list of paired devices within 5-7 seconds, go back and select "Bluetooth".

data.name: help_topic_1_2_list_item_5
data.value: The right and left hearing system each appear on the list once. Both list entries must be clicked for pairing.

data.name: help_topic_1_2_sub_title
data.value: Pair your hearing systems with an Android device

data.name: help_topic_1_3_content_text_1
data.value: After successfully connecting the hearing systems to your smartphone, the hearing systems can now be used with the app. The first time you open the app, you will be prompted to pair / connect your hearing systems with the smartphone during setup. To do this, select the appropriate hearing system from the list of available hearing systems.

data.name: help_topic_1_3_content_text_2
data.value: After completing the test, the app is activated and ready for use.

data.name: help_topic_1_3_sub_title
data.value: Use your hearing systems with the app

data.name: help_topic_2_1_list_item_1
data.value: On your smartphone, go to Settings or Settings → General → Accessibility.

data.name: help_topic_2_2_list_item_1
data.value: On your smartphone, go to Settings → Bluetooth.

data.name: help_topic_2_2_list_item_2
data.value: Tap on the gear icon to the right of your hearing system.

data.name: help_topic_2_content_text
data.value: When you update the software on your smartphone, the connection to your hearing systems may be lost. If this happens, unpair your devices and then reconnect them as described under "Connect / pair hearing systems".

data.name: help_topic_3_content_text
data.value: As soon as you open the app, the startup screen displays the most important features at a glance. You can see the battery status of your hearing systems, access the main menu, easily switch between hearing programs and adjust the volume.

data.name: help_topic_4_content_text_1
data.value: A large icon of the active hearing program is displayed in the center of the screen. The color tells you what kind of program it is. The colors are used throughout the app:

data.name: help_topic_4_content_text_2
data.value: Click on the active hearing program icon to open the detail view where you can make adjustments and settings. Touch the corresponding icon to switch to another hearing program.

data.name: help_topic_4_list_item_1
data.value: Red: Hearing programs set by the hearing care professional

data.name: help_topic_4_list_item_3
data.value: Gray: Favorites created by you (if available)

data.name: help_topic_5_content_text_1
data.value: At the bottom of the screen you'll find the volume control that lets you adjust the volume or mute your hearing systems. To do this, move the slider or use the +/- buttons.

data.name: help_topic_5_content_text_2
data.value: Different volume for right and left (binaural separation):

data.name: help_topic_5_content_text_3
data.value: When binaural separation is activated, the volume control at the bottom of the screen shows a red and a blue triangle. The adjusted ratio is maintained even if you make changes to the overall volume.

data.name: help_topic_5_list_item_1
data.value: On the detail page of a hearing program click the icon to the right, next to the volume slider. Activate "Binaural separation".

data.name: help_topic_5_list_item_2
data.value: In the dialog box, drag the sliders to the optimum setting for you. The blue triangle indicates the volume of your left hearing system, the red one of your right.

data.name: help_topic_6_content_text
data.value: Instead of the basic program, your hearing care professional can also activate the automatic program. Using smart algorithms, it detects the listening situation and automatically selects the correct settings - manual adjustments are not possible in this program.

data.name: help_topic_7_content_text
data.value: The streaming program allows you to transfer sounds from an external source, e.g. phone calls or music, directly into your hearing system. Currently, this is only possible with iOS devices. To use this feature with an Android device, you need additional accessories. Please contact your hearing care professional for more information.

data.name: help_topic_7_list_item_2
data.value: Drag and drop the sliders in the “Sound” tile to adjust the treble, mids, and lows.

data.name: help_topic_7_list_item_3
data.value: The mixer lets you adjust the focus of your hearing system: With the slider, you can adjust the relationship between the sounds from your surroundings and the sound being transmitted from the streaming source directly into the hearing system.

data.name: help_topic_8_content_text_1
data.value: The app allows you to create favorites to save frequently used settings and easily recall them anytime. For example, store the settings you need in the office, while jogging, or in your favorite café, so you can quickly access them.

data.name: help_topic_8_content_text_3
data.value: If you want, you can pair your favorite to a Wi-Fi or a specific location. Your smartphone then detects where you are and then automatically launches the desired program.

data.name: help_topic_8_list_item_1
data.value: Select a program that you want to use to create a new favorite.

data.name: help_topic_8_list_item_2
data.value: In the program, click the gear icon, and then click Create Favorite.

data.name: help_topic_8_list_item_3
data.value: Give your favorite a name and select a suitable icon.

data.name: help_topic_9_content_text
data.value: Click on the menu icon in the top right corner of the screen to open the main menu. From here, you can switch to your programs and navigate to app settings. You can also call up the help function via the main menu. You will also find support and legal information here.

data.name: info_imprint_licencesText
data.value: This is the content for the licenses section.

data.name: initPerm_Description
data.value: To use all the features of this app, the app needs additional permissions. If you enable any of the features listed below, you may be asked to grant the necessary permission. You can withdraw the permissions at any time or disable the respective feature in the settings of the app.

data.name: initPerm_GeolocationDescription
data.value: Allow the app to query the current location

data.name: initPerm_GeolocationHelp
data.value:
This setting allows the app to store the last position of the hearing systems so that they can find them more easily again should you lose them.
You can enable/disable this setting at any time in the app settings.

data.name: initPerm_GeolocationScanMessage
data.value: You have not activated device tracking. The app needs this permission to scan for your hearing systems. To use this feature, enable device tracking in the settings on your smartphone.

data.name: initPerm_MicrophoneDescription
data.value: Allow the app to record audio data using the microphone.

data.name: initPerm_MicrophoneHelp
data.value: This setting allows you to record audio samples using the microphone.

data.name: initPerm_PermissionAlreadyDeniedMessage
data.value: You have already declined permission for ' {0} '. To re-grant permission, please open the settings on your smartphone.

data.name: initPerm_StorageHelp
data.value: Allows you to save audio data to the smartphone

data.name: init_CancelConnectionMessage
data.value: Do you want to cancel the connection attempt to your hearing systems and get more information about establishing a connection?

data.name: init_StepChecking
data.value: Providing access to your hearing systems.

data.name: init_StepConnectionCancellation
data.value: Stop connecting hearing systems. Takes up to 1 min.

data.name: init_StepLoadingCachedProgramParams
data.value: Loading cached hearing system data from the phone.

data.name: introPage1_Description
data.value: Thank you for choosing a hormann hearing system.

data.name: introPage1_ImageSubLine
data.value: The hormann app offers a number of features to facilitate the everyday use of your hearing system.

data.name: introPage2_Description
data.value: Easily control your hearing system with the hormann app.

data.name: introPage2_ImageSubLine
data.value: Use the app as a remote control and adjust the sound and volume or switch between programs.

data.name: introPage2_Title
data.value: Remote control of your hearing system

data.name: introPage3_Description
data.value: Apply individual modifications to your hearing programs.

data.name: introPage3_ImageSubLine
data.value: You can save these modifications as your own favorites.

data.name: introPage4_Description
data.value: Always allow the hormann app to access your location in order to find your hearing devices or to set up location specific hearing programs.

data.name: introPage4_ImageSubLine
data.value: The hormann app uses your location in the background to provide updated information.

data.name: introPage5_Description
data.value: We hope you enjoy using your hormann hearing system and the hormann app.

data.name: introPage5_ImageSubLine
data.value: If you have further questions, please refer to the instructions or contact your hearing care professional.

data.name: loc_msg_AllHearingAidsStillConnected
data.value: Your hearing systems are still connected to the smartphone, which means they are close by. Use near field search to find your hearing systems.

data.name: loc_msg_GPSHardwareNotEnabled
data.value: GPS is disabled. GPS must be enabled to use this feature.

data.name: loc_msg_NoGPSHardwareFound
data.value: Your smartphone does not have GPS hardware. You cannot use this feature.

data.name: loc_msg_NoInstrumentLocationsFound
data.value: No location data for your hearing systems has been found.

data.name: mainPage_UnableToSwitchProgramWhileLoading_Favorite
data.value: Program data are loading. Please be patient.

data.name: mainPage_UnableToSwitchProgramWhileLoading_Normal
data.value: Program data are loading. Please be patient.

data.name: mainPage_VolumeUnableToChange
data.value: Volume settings are being loaded. Please wait.

data.name: oem_support_desc_1
data.value: Please contact your hearing care professional.

data.name: program_auto_changed_subtitle
data.value: Hearing system program was changed automatically!

data.name: prog_AutomationConnectedWiFiDesc
data.value: This hearing system program is automatically activated when connected to this Wi-Fi.

data.name: prog_AutomationConnectedWifiNotFound
data.value: No Wi-Fi detected. Make sure that the device is connected.

data.name: prog_AutomationConnectionAndroid8Hint
data.value: For Android devices with Version 8 or later, access to location data is required.

data.name: prog_AutomationConnectionIos13Hint
data.value: For iOS devices with Version 13 or later, access to location data is required.

data.name: prog_AutomationConnectToLocationInsufficientLocationPermissions
data.value: Permission to collect location data in the background was denied or service is disabled. Setting a location for a hearing program is disabled.

data.name: prog_AutomationDescription
data.value: You can connect your hearing program to a specific location or to Wi-Fi. Your hearing program will then start automatically.

data.name: prog_dlgChangeProgramDescription
data.value: You are in an area you have defined. Should the hearing system switch to the appropriate situation?

data.name: prog_dlgGeofenceAlreadyExist
data.value: Unfortunately, the position you have chosen has already been used. Please specify a different position.

data.name: prog_dlgWifiAlreadyExist
data.value: You have already connected this network to another hearing program.

data.name: prog_msgCancelFavoritCreationMessage
data.value: Your hearing program "{0}" will not be saved.

data.name: prog_msgCancelFavoritCreationMessageNoname
data.value: Your hearing program will not be saved.

data.name: prog_msgDeleteMessage
data.value: Do you really want to delete the hearing program "{0}"?

data.name: prog_msgErrorNoIconMessage
data.value: Select an icon for the program!

data.name: prog_msgErrorNoProgramNameMessage
data.value: Please give the hearing program a name!

data.name: prog_msgResetMessage
data.value: Do you really want to reset the hearing program parameters?

data.name: prog_ParamAutoProgramDescription
data.value: Your hearing system automatically recognizes the situation and chooses the best settings.

data.name: prog_ParamBinauralDescription
data.value: Set different volume for right and left

data.name: prog_ParamEqualizerDescription
data.value: Reduces or increases depths, mids and highs in the sound spectrum

data.name: prog_ParamNoiseReductionDescription
data.value: Reduces noise in your immediate surroundings.

data.name: prog_ParamSpeechFocusDescription
data.value: Configure the directionality of your hearing system to the viewing direction.

data.name: prog_ParamSpeechStrengthDescription
data.value: Strengthens human speech in your immediate surroundings.

data.name: prog_ParamStreamingDescription
data.value: Adjust the volume of your surroundings in relation to the audio source.

data.name: prog_ParamTinnitusDescription
data.value: Here you can activate the tinnitus program, adjusting both the volume and sound of the noise.

data.name: prog_ParamWindShieldDescription
data.value: Reduces wind noise in your immediate environment.

data.name: prog_SettingsAppReset
data.value: Do you really want to reset the app?

data.name: prog_SettingsDescription
data.value: Here you can customize your hearing program, reset it or create a hearing program from your current settings. You can also get your hearing program to start automatically.

data.name: prog_SettingsDescriptionAutoProgram
data.value: Here you can customize your hearing program. In automatic mode, you can only change the name and icon of the program. All other settings are managed automatically.

data.name: remoteHelp_PageTitle
data.value: Help with installing new adjustment settings

data.name: remove_hearing_aid_Desc
data.value: Here you can remove the current link to a hearing system.

data.name: selectDevices_Description
data.value:
The app is now looking for your hearing systems. This process may take some time.
Please select your hearing systems from the list and confirm your selection with "Connect hearing systems".

data.name: selectDevices_DlgConfirmHearingAidManagementDescription
data.value: Please confirm that the app should use your newly selected hearing systems.

data.name: selectDevices_NotifyNoHearingAidsSelected
data.value: You cannot disable all hearing systems. Please select the devices that you would like to use in the app!

data.name: settingPage_LanguageInfoDesc
data.value: Please choose a language from the list below:

data.name: settings_AppMode_Title
data.value: Please select the mode in which you wish to use the app.

data.name: settings_languageTitle
data.value: Choose a language from the list.

data.name: start_StartHearingModeForDevices
data.value:
You can now connect your hearing systems.
Please turn your hearing systems off and then on again and confirm with "Start Scan"!

data.name: toast_max_favorite_msg
data.value: Unfortunately, you cannot create any more favorites.

data.name: welcomePageInfoText
data.value: Thank you for downloading this app. This app allows you to: • Control your hearing systems • Create your own hearing programs • Obtain information about your hearing solution • Create statistics regarding the use of your hearing systems • Contact support

data.name: widget_EmptyViewTest
data.value: The app is closed. To use the widget you must start the app. Touch here to start the app.

data.name: wifi_Connected_Fallback
data.value: Please connect to Wi-Fi if you want to use this.
